      • createCourseOffering

        public void createCourseOffering​(Course c,
                                 int secNum,
                                 int secCap)
        createCourseOffering creates and adds a course offering to a particular course in the catalogue
        Parameters:
        c - is the course to which will have a new offering
        secNum - is the section number if the new offering
        secCap - is the capacity of the new offering

      • searchCat

        public Course searchCat​(java.lang.String courseName,
                        int courseNum)
        searchCat searches the courseCatalogue for a particular course by its name and identifier (course Number)
        Parameters:
        courseName - is the name of the course to be found
        courseNum - is the number/identifier of the course to be found
        Returns:
        the course if it is found in the catalogue
